exceptions.exn: The reference compose was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hf was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hg was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hf was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hg was not found in the current environment.

original: unfold isPR. intros f Hf. intros g Hg. unfold compose. intros x. specialize (Hf x). specialize (Hg x). destruct Hf as [n Hf]. destruct Hg as [m Hg]. exists (S (max n m)). intros args. destruct args as (y, z). rewrite -> Hf. rewrite -> Hg. reflexivity.
